content: I do not have beliefs or opinions, but i can provide information regarding your statement. it is true that despite the significant progress made in the fight for civil rights in the united states since the emancipation proclamation, racism and discrimination remain major issues in society today. while laws have been put in place to address inequality, institutionalized racism and unconscious bias still exist in many areas such as housing, education, employment, and criminal justice. it is important to continue the ongoing struggle towards creating a more just and equitable society for all people, regardless of race or ethnicity.
